summary: SummaryRevitalize the delicate eye area with DHC Concentrated Eye Cream, a skin-rejuvenating eye cream that targets fine lines, crow's feet, and dark circles.
details: DetailsBenefitsProvides moisture relief and targets fine lines, crow's feet and dark circlesBotanical antioxidants help protect against free radicals and environmental stressorsOffers soothing relief with cucumber and ginseng extractsFast-absorbing and non-greasy formulaFragrance-free and colorant-freeIdeal for all skin types, including dry and sensitiveKey IngredientsOrganic Olive Oil: Rich in antioxidants, it maintains the skin's moisture barrier and helps protect against free radicals.Tocopherol (vitamin E): Natural skin conditioner and antioxidant that protects against free radical damageSodium Hyaluronate: A derivative of hyaluronic acid, acts as an excellent skin conditioner and humectant to promote hydrated skin.Squalane: Antioxidant-rich, olive-derived squalane moisturizes and helps skin feel soft.Item 2544327How To UseAfter applying liquid lotion, use the tip of your finger to lightly pat cream under and around eyes. Follow with facial moisturizer.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Juice, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Stearic Acid, Hydrogenated Palm Oil, Squalane, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Polysorbate 60, Cetyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Stearate, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Alcohol, Potassium Hydroxide, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Carbomer, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Tocopherol, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Aesculus Hippocastanum (Horse Chestnut) Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sasa Veitchii Leaf Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Citric Acid , Royal Jelly Extract, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After applying liquid lotion, use the tip of your finger to lightly pat cream under and around eyes. Follow with facial moisturizer.

reviews.headline: My favorite
reviews.comments: I have tried several eye creams for my dark circles, and fine lines. I keep coming back to this one. It has lightened my dark circles, and has helped with my fine lines. A little bit goes a long way. I have been using this eye cream for several years now, and I won't change.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: I needed eye cream was completely out so I switched and noticed a difference in puffiness under my eyes so I ordered this item again which I have used now for a couple years. I works great and no more switching for me.

reviews.headline: The best eye cream
reviews.comments: I have also purchased this to use  in my daily regimen.  My eyes are tighter smoother and the skin is plump and glowing.  I use after the Olive oil cream by DHC. My go to for dewy smooth skin.

reviews.headline: Needs to be thicker
reviews.comments: I bought this eye cream after reading the reviews but I have to say so far Im disappointed. I havent seen results as well the consistancy is very thin. I wont be buying this again

reviews.headline: Not right for my skin
reviews.comments: At first I liked this cream, but after a week or two I noticed some little bumps forming under one of my eyes. I stopped using it, but the bumps turned into what seems like a little dry eczema patch that is taking a long time to go away.

reviews.headline: Dries out my undereyes :(
reviews.comments: Unfortunately, this product did not work for me. It completely dries out my under eyes and causes flaky skin. My skin is so sensitive in that area. Can't use the product

reviews.headline: I love this stuff!
reviews.comments:
I use this morning and evening. Works well under makeup. 
Buy it, you won't be disappointed!

reviews.headline: Best eye cream
reviews.comments: I've tried so many expensive eye creams but have been using this religiously for over a year now. It's so  hydrating and light, absorbs super quickly

reviews.headline: VERY DRYING!
reviews.comments: I hated it! The area under my eyes went from moisturized and plum, to dry and crepe-like using this product. It's extremely drying! I went back to what I was using before. This was awful!!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Have been using it for about a week and I'm loving it! It's so moisturizing and you only need a little bit. It's one of those eye creams that will last you a while! Worth it

reviews.headline: Soooo Moisturizing
reviews.comments:
I love this eye cream. It's moisturizing, smoothing, and sinks into the skin quickly while still leaving a nice, small bit of glow.

As for the "targeting aging" aspect of this eye cream, I don't really think it's there. Keeping the eye area moisturized will obviously contribute to keeping the eye area looking youthful, but I wouldn't trust this for major prevention.

 If you're in your early to mid twenties, like me, this is a good starter for prevention, but I'd suggest shopping around for stronger prevention as you move into your late twenties.  

If you have deeper lines, bags or wrinkles, you should only expect to gain moisturization from this product.

reviews.headline: Would buy again
reviews.comments: Hydrating and noticed signs off less puffiness

reviews.headline: Lightweight and moisturizing
reviews.comments: I noticed my eye seems to be slightly more moisturized. I like the soft whipped feel of the eye cream. I hope to see better results with longer usage. I do add Origins GinZing eye cream as a brightening effect on top.

reviews.headline: Best
reviews.comments: Best eye cream! I have sensitive skin especially around my eyes, and my eyes are also sensitive (not that I'm putting this in my eye but ya know).  Zero(!) irritation üôèüèΩ and so creamy. Skin is plump and glowy from it. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Great for sensitive skin/eyes

reviews.headline: Pleasantly surprised
reviews.comments: I have dry skin and have really been enjoying this product. I gave it 4 stars only because I started it in the winter and could use something just a bit heavier for my personal liking during this time of year but the product itself is not to light or too heavy in general. Overall a great product. A little goes a long way and they provide a very decent amount of product.

reviews.headline: Not for me.
reviews.comments: I was really excited to try this I cream, especially after seeing so many glowing reviews. I was really hoping to have found an economically-priced hidden gem. However, this cream did not address my eye area concerns. I don't really have dark circles, puffs, or bags. I am 36 and have oily skin. I was really looking for moderate hydration with an emphasis on the fine lines around my eyes. I will admit that this cream is extremely hydrating, and perhaps softened the look of the lines a tiny bit due to that hydration. But that was only when I was not wearing make up. I found that the screen was too heavy for me to wear underneath I make up, and that anything that I put around my eyes would inevitably settle into the creases under them. To be clear, I wear waterproof mascara, waterproof eyeliner, and really good eyeshadow primer. I set everything with setting powder. However, within a few hours, I would have substantial black blobs under my eyes whenever I wore this eye cream under my eye make up. This may work really well for other people, but it just wasn't for me.

reviews.headline: Drying
reviews.comments: I ordered this after good reviews. It was drying for my 55 year old under eye area.

reviews.headline: It's gonna be a no from me dawg
reviews.comments: I ordered this because it's cheap and had okay reviews. I got it in the mail and started using it immediately.. it's been about a month and I've seen no improvement at all in fact my under eyes look worse. 0/10 currently looking for new eye cream.

reviews.headline: Used  this product line for  24 years
reviews.comments: Love this product line, been using it since my early 20s.  Nothing beats this eye cream, trust me I am a product junky.  I love that Ulta sells this product line now.

properties.name: Pros

values.label: Have been using it for more than 10 years

display_values: Have been using it for more than 10 years

media.headline: It's my only eye cream to go to for about 7 years
media.caption: It works for wrinkles around eyes

media.headline: The only I cream I use
media.caption: Eye area

faceoff_positive.comments: I use this eye cream every single day, after cleansing my face, morning and night. It removes any remaining traces of eye makeup, and moisturizes the fine skin around my eyes without being oily or irritating. I have used it for years, and hope to use it for years to come. I appreciate that it has no added fragrance.
faceoff_positive.headline: Lovely Eye Cream

faceoff_negative.comments: This is the tiniest "travel" size I've ever seen!  More like a "weekender". It's so small, I hesitate to use much of it -- it'll be gone before I have the chance to really like it or last through my trip.
faceoff_negative.headline: Too little to know
